201028473.qualifier:
Advance Purchase Promotion
Book a stay in an Advance Purchase rate category at least 15 days in advance and receive a 10% discount off the room rate reflected at time of booking.
All hotel reservations are subject to availability and must be made in advance. Offer is not valid with groups/conventions and may not be combined with other promotional offers. Savings is based on the Hyatt Daily Rate. Discount is reflective in rate confirmed at time of reservation. Requires full-prepayment and is non-refundable. Rate is per room per night, excluding service charges, taxes and other incidental expenses. Additional guests may be subject to additional hotel charges. Additional charges apply to room-type upgrades. A limited number of rooms are allocated to this offer. Guests are responsible for all charges exclusive of this offer. No refunds for any unused portion of the offer. Promotional blackout periods may apply due to seasonal periods or special events, and normal arrival/departure restrictions apply. Hyatt reserves the right to alter or withdraw this program at any time without notice. Other restrictions may apply.

description:
Location.
Adjacent to International Convention Centre, Hyatt Regency Birmingham is just off popular Broad Street, a 5-minute walk from The Mailbox shopping and dining, and about 1 km from New Street Station. National Indoor Arena, Brindleyplace, and Snow Hill Station are each less than a 2-km drive.

Hotel Features.
Hyatt Regency Birmingham features a terrace and a fireplace in lobby as well as a health club with an indoor pool, a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. Aria Restaurant offers European-inspired dishes, and stylish The Gentleman & Scholar offers an a la carte menu; 24-hour room service is also available. For events, this hotel has conference rooms, banquet facilities, and a ballroom. Staff can arrange wedding services, event catering, translation services, and currency exchange. A 24-hour business center, free WiFi, meeting rooms for small groups, and secretarial services are available.

Guestrooms.
319 guestrooms at Hyatt Regency Birmingham feature televisions equipped with satellite channels and pay movies. Rooms provide free WiFi and direct-dial phones with voice mail. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations, bathrobes, and makeup/shaving mirrors. Hypo-allergenic bedding and wake-up calls are available upon request. Turndown service is offered nightly.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Location.
Adjacent to International Convention Centre, Hyatt Regency Birmingham is just off popular Broad Street, a 5-minute walk from The Mailbox shopping and dining, and about 1 km from New Street Station. National Indoor Arena, Brindleyplace, and Snow Hill Station are each less than a 2-km drive.

Hotel Features.
Hyatt Regency Birmingham features a terrace and a fireplace in lobby as well as a health club with an indoor pool, a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. Aria Restaurant offers European-inspired dishes, and stylish The Gentleman & Scholar offers an a la carte menu; 24-hour room service is also available. For events, this hotel has conference rooms, banquet facilities, and a ballroom. Staff can arrange wedding services, event catering, translation services, and currency exchange. A 24-hour business center, free WiFi, meeting rooms for small groups, and secretarial services are available.

Guestrooms.
319 guestrooms at Hyatt Regency Birmingham feature televisions equipped with satellite channels and pay movies. Rooms provide free WiFi and direct-dial phones with voice mail. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations, bathrobes, and makeup/shaving mirrors. Hypo-allergenic bedding and wake-up calls are available upon request. Turndown service is offered nightly.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
Dining options include The Gentleman & Scholar, a sophisticated but welcoming pub that offers a tempting range of a la carte dishes to suit all tastes. The Aria, located on the main lobby level under a spacious and unique glass-roofed atrium, offers a relaxed atmosphere, perfect to enjoy a wide range of dishes inspired by Modern English Cuisine style, all of which are recommended by the Chefs.

Hyatt Regency Birmingham features a health club with an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna, as well as cardio machines and free weight equipment. Amala Spa offers day spa services such as massage, treatment rooms, and beauty services.

Event facilities include conference rooms, a ballroom, banquet facilities, and meeting rooms for small groups. For work-oriented guests, the hotel has a 24-hour business center, free wireless Internet access, secretarial services, and audio-visual equipment. Wedding services, translation services, and currency exchange are available.

DINING.value:
Aria Restaurant - Located on the main lobby level under a spacious and unique glass-roofed atrium. This restaurant offers a wide range of dishes inspired by Modern English Cuisine style, all of which are recommended by the Chefs. Open daily for breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner.

The Gentleman & Scholar - This sophisticated but welcoming pub opens onto Broad Street with a heated terrace. With a selection of exquisite cocktails, fine wines, champagnes, beers, and local ales, The Gentleman & Scholar provides the perfect place to enjoy a drink before a night out, or after dinner.

Atrium Lobby - This bar with skylight ceiling provides the ideal setting for enjoying afternoon tea or a relaxing drink.

Continental or Full breakfast - Available daily for a surcharge.

Room service - Available for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks throughout the day.

RECREATION.value:
Refurbished in September 2011, the Amala Spa and Club includes an indoor pool, plunge pool, sauna, and steam room, as well as cardio and weight-lifting equipment. Cardio machines feature personal televisions and iPod connections.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

The preferred airport for Hyatt Regency Birmingham is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

HCOM_SPA.value: Amala Spa offers massages and beauty services, as well as a hammam, hydrotherapy, and mud wraps. The spa has 6 treatment rooms, including a couples treatment room.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Airport: 10 minutes
In the heart of Birmingham, just minutes walk from New Street Train Station, the Bull Ring Shopping Centre and the vibrant bars on Broad Street. The International Convention Centre is just across the road. Also near the National Indoor Arena, and only 10 minutes by train from both Birmingham International Airport and National Exhibition Centre.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• Children 12 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for full breakfast: GBP 18.75 per person (approximately)
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with spa, near International Convention Centre

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_TRAVELING_WITH_CHILDREN.value: • Children (12 years old and younger) stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_DINING.value:
Aria Restaurant - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine and serves breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner.

The Gentleman and Scholar - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine. Guests can enjoy alfresco dining (weather permitting).

Atrium Lobby - Onsite lobby lounge. Open daily.

HCOM_IN_HOTEL.value:
• Full breakfast daily (surcharge)
  • Restaurant
  • Bar/lounge
  • 24-hour room service
  • Coffee/tea in a common area

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for an additional charge

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Full breakfast is offered for an extra charge of GBP 18.75 per person (approximately)

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 319 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Full-service spa
  • Indoor pool
  • Breakfast available
  • Health club
  • 24-hour business center
  • Terrace
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Coffee/tea in a common area
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Computer station
  • Lobby fireplace
  • Laundry service
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Wedding services
  • Luggage storage
  • TV in a common area

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Hyatt Regency Birmingham offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Big Brum. Guests can visit the spa to indulge in massages, hydrotherapy, or mani/pedis, and British cuisine is served at Aria Restaurant, which is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. An indoor pool and a bar/lounge are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like bathrobes and slippers.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• International Convention Centre (0 mi / 0.1 km)
  • Big Brum (0.3 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Barclaycard Arena (0.3 mi / 0.6 km)
  • Victoria Square (0.3 mi / 0.6 km)
  • The Mailbox (0.4 mi / 0.7 km)

POLICIES.value: There is no extra bed fee for children 12 and under. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
